1982 Soccer World Cup Results

All the results from the games played in the 1982 World Cup with goals scored, extratime and penalties information.

Game Date Stage Results
1. Jun 13, 1982 1st Round, Group C Argentina 0 - 1 Belgium
2. Jun 14, 1982 1st Round, Group F Brazil 2 - 1 Soviet Union
3. Jun 14, 1982 1st Round, Group A Italy 0 - 0 Poland
4. Jun 15, 1982 1st Round, Group F Scotland 5 - 2 New Zealand
5. Jun 15, 1982 1st Round, Group C Hungary 10 - 1 El Salvador

( 2 - 2 ) on extra time
( 5 - 4 ) on penalties

52. Jul 11, 1982 Final Game Italy 3 - 1 West Germany
